awards.title: Veuve Clicquot Zaken Vrouw van het Jaar 2013
awards.description:
De Prix Veuve Clicquot heeft als doel vrouwelijk ondernemerschap en vrouwelijk management te stimuleren. De onderscheiding is een eerbetoon aan de legendarische jonge weduwe Nicole-Barbe Clicquot Ponsardin, die in het begin van de vorige eeuw de leiding kreeg over dit champagnehuis en het tot grote bloei wist te brengen.

De Prix Veuve Clicquot wordt in principe jaarlijks toegekend aan die zakenvrouw uit het Nederlandse bedrijfsleven of organisatie die madame Clicquot’s kwaliteiten en eigenschappen in zich heeft: visie, leidinggevende capaciteiten, dynamisch, creatief, innovatieve gaven en doorzettingsvermogen. En voorts een persoonlijkheid met een gevestigde reputatie die zakelijke en maatschappelijke betrokkenheid uitdraagt.

De onderscheiding wordt in 18 landen uitgereikt. In Nederland gebeurt dat onder auspiciën van Veuve Clicquot Ponsardin champagne, in samenwerking met het Stan Huygens Journaal van het dagblad De Telegraaf en met medewerking van Ernst & Young.

profile_positions.description: African Parks is a non-profit organisation that takes total responsibility for the rehabilitation and long-term management of national parks in partnership with governments and local communities. Our approach combines world-class conservation practice with business expertise. We place emphasis on achieving financial sustainability of the parks by combining long-term donor funding with tourism revenues, related business enterprise and payment for ecosystem services, which all serve as a foundation for economic development and poverty alleviation. It is our belief that making wildlife parks socially and economically viable, particularly for the benefit of local communities, will contribute to their survival in the face of competing forms of land use.
profile_positions.title: Board member NL

profile_positions.description: Peak Capital is a European venture capital firm which provides smart capital and pro-active hands-on support to fast-growing highly-scalable marketplaces, SaaS or data startups. Established in 2007, Peak Capital manages 4 funds, with the first 3 funds being fully invested. And notable exits of IENS (sold to Tripadvisor (NASDAQ: TRIP)), Radionomy (exited to Vivendi (EPA:VIV)) and Cheapcargo (sold to PostNL (AMS:PNL)).
profile_positions.title: Founding Partner

profile_positions.description:
Het Future Food Fund is een door 25 ondernemers gefinancierd, nieuw early stage venture capital fonds dat zich richt op ambitieuze Nederlandse ondernemingen die impact willen maken met innovatieve technologieën binnen de Agri-Horti-Food sector.

www.futurefoodfund.nl
profile_positions.title: Founding Partner

profile_positions.description: For more than sixty years, Efteling has held a special position in the European market for day and holiday recreation. Efteling creates its wonderful image with its multi-faceted interpretation and presentation of fairy tale themes. The unique product leads to an individual and extremely strong market proposition, which draws more than three million visitors to the attraction park each year. Efteling’s activities focus completely on making the short holiday of the visitors as enchanting and amazing as possible
profile_positions.title: Member of the Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description: De LOEY Awards zijn dé onafhankelijke prijzen voor de beste ondernemers in de Nederlandse online industrie. Doel van de LOEY Awards is het stimuleren van de groei, innovatie en inspiratie in de online industrie in Nederland. De LOEYs zijn een gezamenlijk initiatief van Endeit Capital en Peak Capital.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder and Board Member

profile_positions.description:
Endeit Capital is an independent investment firm based in Amsterdam (NL) and Hamburg (DE). Since 2006, Endeit Capital has invested with its first fund in 20 companies, which together acquired 27 add-on companies and expanded into 22 countries. Their combined revenues increased to €825 million implying a 33% compounded average growth rate.


Hummingbird Ventures is a venture capital fund for high-growth digital media and software companies. In addition to funding, Hummingbird Ventures leverages its extensive operational experience and worldwide network to actively help startups accelerate their growth.

Ventures Africa Fund (eVA Fund) is the first venture capital firm investing in African SME’s active in digital media.  Broadband and Mobile Internet Access in Africa is showing tremendous growth, enabling Africans to get connected to the world.  African SME’s are rapidly developing localized applications, content, platforms and solutions enabling over a billion Africans to use the web for communication, business, e-learning, news, transactions.
profile_positions.title: Investor

profile_positions.description:
FD Mediagroep is a multimedia company with a unique combination of print, radio, online material and events aimed at providing business people with news and background information at any time of day.


The FD brand has evolved into one of multimedia dimensions, reaching consumers of news by means of print, online products and events throughout the day, seven days a week. The FD is much more than a newspaper. It provides a highly select group of business people with all the news that counts, not only through the pages of the newspaper but also by means of a variety of supplements, online products and events. The FD’s core values are reliability, enrichment, and connection. The FD’s approach, which is based on the reporting of real facts, enriches the information it provides with coherent, penetrating insight. The FD presents all items of news in a positive yet critical fashion, while always looking ahead and staying right on top of events. The FD provides direction and inspiration for the successful enterprise. The mission of the FD is to be the source of news and inspiration for business people.

There is more to BNR than only news. BNR challenges, connects, and inspires. BNR is for ambitious, daring and enterprising people who see opportunities and take control. Those who listen to BNR Nieuwsradio, visit BNR.nl, or attend BNR events get ahead of the rest of the Netherlands. The mission of BNR is to be constantly aware of the challenges posed by current events, and to bring together challenging people, opinions and ideas. Together, the FD and BNR, offer a powerful marketing platform for effective advertising propositions. Specific details on FD and BNR are given in the product matrix.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description:
Jaarlijks maken ruim 100.000 jongeren op school gebruik van de ondernemerschapsprogramma’s van Jong Ondernemen. Uit wetenschappelijk onderzoek blijkt dat jongeren die ondernemerschapsonderwijs hebben gevolgd, beter beslagen ten ijs komen en sneller succesvol zijn in hun werkomgeving.

Met de programma’s die Jong Ondernemen hiervoor heeft ontwikkeld, krijgen jongeren de kans een ondernemende houding te ontwikkelen en te ontdekken waar hun talenten en kwaliteiten liggen, om ze daarmee nog beter toe te rusten voor de toekomst.

https://www.jongondernemen.nl/nl/
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description: DQ&A Media Group is an international display advertising company, specialising in real-time performance marketing and technology services. As a real-time performance driven agency we provide the technological backbone that enables advertisers to get their digital campaigns live, streamlining processes, utilising top range media buying technology and experienced ad operators, media buyers and consultants to expertly execute campaigns with accuracy, speed and results. With state of the art tools for analyzing, optimizing and reporting closing the loop on successful real-time campaigns, advertisers can be guaranteed a fully transparent one-stop shop for their online marketing requirements and realization of their ROI goals.
profile_positions.title: Co - Founder
